price: Is it that every time they ratify a covenant, a party of them cast it aside? In fact, most of them do not believe.
arabic: أَوَكُلَّمَا عَٰهَدُواْ عَهۡدٗا نَّبَذَهُۥ فَرِيقٞ مِّنۡهُمۚ بَلۡ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
